event.title: began with the building of a sawmill by Elizur and Stanley Ruggles in 1832

data.event: The village of Milford began with the building of a sawmill by Elizur and Stanley Ruggles in 1832.

event.title: 1835, the first post office was established

data.event: In 1835, the first post office was established with Aaron Phelps as postmaster.
The Lower Mill Pond was created in 1836 to provide waterpower for the various types of mills and factories.
The Upper Mill Pond followed in 1845.
In 1911, the Hubbell Pond was created by a dam built on the Huron River to generate electricity.
